alert.note: Alert for Mercer; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 3:49PM EDT until July 24 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Mercer County in northwestern Pennsylvania... West central Venango County in northwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 349 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles east of Greenville, or 14 miles northwest of Grove City, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Franklin, Sugarcreek, Stoneboro, Polk, Sandy Lake, Utica, New Lebanon, and Maurice K Goddard State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
